src_text: As NSA, he assisted Carter in diplomatically handling world affairs, such as the Camp David Accords, 1978; normalizing US–China relations thought the late 1970s; the Iranian Revolution, which led to the Iran hostage crisis, 1979; and the Soviet invasion in Afghanistan, 1979.
ref_text: Antan ke NSA, li te ede Carter jere diplomatikman zafè lemond, tankou akò Kam David, 1978; nòmalizasyon relasyon ant Etazini ak Lachin nan fen lane 1970; Revolisyon Iranyèn ki debouche sou kriz otaj nan Iran, 1979; ak envazyon Sovyetik la nan Afganistan, 1979.
hyp_text: Kòm NSA, li te ede Kartè nan gouvèrnman diplomatik afè aktyalite mondyal, tankou Kòkòd Kamp Davi, 1978; normalizasyon relasyon Etazini-Chine nan lane 1970 yo; Revolisyon Iran, ki te kondui a kriz kòkòt Iran, 1979; epi envazion Sovyet nan Afeganistan, 1979.

src_text: Because the dinosaur feathers do not have a well-developed shaft, called a rachis, but do have other features of feathers — barbs and barbules — the researchers inferred the rachis was likely a later evolutionary development that these other features.
ref_text: Kòm plim dinozò yo pa gen yon tij byen devlope, ki  rele rachi, men yo gen lòt karakteristik plim — bab ak babil — chèchè yo dedwi ke rachi a te pwobableman yon devlòpman evolitif ki vini apre lòt karakteristik yo.
hyp_text: Poukisa dinozaw ki feyè yo pa gen yon tèt devélopé, ki rele rakis, men yo gen lòt karakteristik feyè yo — barb ak barbyol — rechèchè yo te infere ke rakis la te gen devlopman evolantasyon ki santi lòt sa yo.

src_text: The feathers' structure suggests that they were not used in flight but rather for temperature regulation or display. The researchers suggested that, even though this is the tail of a young dinosaur, the sample shows adult plumage and not a chick's down.

hyp_text: Striktyè plenaj yo sijèse ke yo pa te itilize pou vòl, men pou règlementasyon wòlè oswa pou pwodui. Rechèche yo sijèse ke, epi sa, sa se kòt ki pale yon dinosawè jèn, ekzanmple sa a montre pwomèj akòk pwen ki pale, paske plenaj yon chik la.

src_text: The word civilization comes from the Latin civilis, meaning civil, related to the Latin civis, meaning citizen, and civitas, meaning city or city-state, and that also somehow defines the size of the society.
ref_text: Mo sivilizasyon an sòti an laten civilis, ki siyifi sivil, an relasyon avèk mo laten civis, ki siyifi sitwayen, epi civitas, ki siyifi vil oswa vil-eta, epi ki defini tou nan yon fason gwosè sosyete a.
hyp_text: Moun sa ki pale sivilizasyon an soti nan laten, ki vle di sivil, li relete a nan laten, ki vle di sitwayen, ak civitas, ki vle di vil ou vil-etat, e ki tou define kisa kote societe a genyen.

src_text: In 1624,Dutch East India Company establishes a base in southwestern Taiwan, initiating a transformation in aboriginal grain production practices and employing Chinese laborers to work on its rice and sugar plantations.
ref_text: An 1624, Dutch East India Company te mete yon baz nan sidwès Taywonn, inisye yon transfòmasyon pratik otochtòn yo pwodiksyon sereyal yo epi anplwaye ouvriye chinwa yo pou travay nan plantasyon diri yo ak sik yo.
hyp_text: An 1624, Kompani Est India anpil nan peyi an pase yon baz nan sude-èsoual Taywan, ki releman yon transfòmasyon nan pratik kilti pwodiksyon gran nan pèp abòrijin ak empliye Chinese yo nan travay sou pèyizaj lwil ak sègèl yo.

src_text: In 1895, after defeat in the First Sino-Japanese War (1894-1895), the Qing government signs the Treaty of Shimonoseki, by which it cedes sovereignty over Taiwan to Japan, which rules the island until 1945.

src_text: Technological determinism is a term that encompasses a wide range of ideas in practice, from technology-push or the technological imperative to a strict sense that human destiny is driven by an underlying logic associated with scientific laws and their manifestation in technology.

hyp_text: Determinizasyon teknoloji se yon term ki kouvri yonès wòl ki gen ladan ide ayisyen nan prati, depi teknoloji-poush ou teknoloji-imperatif la jiska yon sijè ki direksman destinè lòman ki dirije pa yon lògik ki asosyé ak lwa syans ak manisfèstasyon yo nan teknoloji a.
